Html: I am using the latest of everything (that I am aware of).  Building QuickGraph 2.0 using VS2008 and Pex 0.7 get build errors as PexUseGenericArguments seems to be missing (BinaryHeapTest.cs).  I commented out the attribute and i then build and all unit tests passed, but I thought someone shoudl know.

You're right. PexUseGenericArguments was renamed but I have not updated the 2.0 branch.
Why not working on the 3.0?

I am unable to find the following attributes in PEX.Framwrok.Factories,  if they are renamed, then kindly share its alternate. I will be grateful to you. Thank You.

PexUseGenericArguments attribute

[PexFactoryClass] attribute

Kind Regards,

Majid Ismail.
